typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceJustHeaders
source1 aggregate(rowcount = count()) ~> rowCount
rowCount split(rowcount == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> zeroRowsCheck@(zeroRows, default)
sourceJustHeaders keyGenerate(output(rownum as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 filter(rownum == 1) ~> justHeaderRow
zeroRowsCheck@zeroRows, justHeaderRow union(byName: true)~> Union1
zeroRowsCheck@default, origdata union(byName: true)~> Union2
source1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> origdata
Union2 filter(isNull(rowcount)) ~> removeNull
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['movieheaders.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		each(match(name!='rowcount'&&name!='rownum'))
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkJustHeader
removeNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['movieheaders.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		each(match(name!='rowcount'))
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkFullData
